fu2
HSK 1: 服
HSK 2: 夫
HSK 4: 福,符
HSK 5: 佛,幅,扶
HSK 6: 伏,浮,俘,辐,袱,輻
Freq: 8589
虙拼音是fú, 笔划是11。另有虙子贱者，鲁国人，孔子弟子。常被写做宓子贱、伏子贱。唐·贾至有文《虙子贱碑颂》，赞子贱之贤德。
The pinyin of Feng is fú, and the stroke is 11. There are also people who are cheap, Lu people, and disciples of Confucius. It is often written as Mi Zijian and Fu Zijian. Tang Jia Zhiyou's text "Ode to a Stele of the Inferior", praised the virtue of the inferior.

虙字的基本解释

虙
fú
姓。

虙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》房六切，入屋，奉。］
(1)虎貌。
(2)通“伏”。藏匿；埋伏。
(3)通“伏”。姓。虙羲氏，即伏羲氏。

虙字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虍字部】　虙； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1074第04
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?房六切，音服。【說文】虎貌。　又【廣韻】古與伏通。【正韻】虙犧氏，以能馴虙犧牲也。　又與宓通。【顏氏家訓】孔子弟子虙子賤爲單父宰，卽虙犧之後。俗字亦爲宓，今兗州永昌郡，舊單父地是也。東門有子賤碑，漢世所立，乃云濟南伏生卽子賤之後，乃知虙與伏古來通，字誤以爲宓。【前漢·司馬相如傳】靑琴虙?之徒。【師古註】虙與伏字同，字本作虙也。

虙字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
虙字的起名意思

虎貌；通"伏"。藏匿；埋伏；通"伏"。姓。虙羲氏，即伏羲氏。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Feng Zi Department] 　虙; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1074 Page 04
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Room six cuts, sound service. [Said the text] Tiger appearance.　[Guangyun] Ancient and Futong. 【Zhengyun】Guo sacrifice, so as to be able to tame the sacrifice.　 and Mi communicated again. [Family Instructions of Yan Family] Confucian disciple Guo Zi Jian was slaughtered by a single father, after the sacrifice. The vulgar word is also Mi. Today, Yongchang County, Yanzhou, is also the old Danfu land. There is the Zijian monument in the east gate, erected in the Han Dynasty, after the Yun Jinan Fusheng Yi Zijian, Naizhiyu and Fugulai were connected, the word was mistaken for Mi. 【Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography】Tianqin Qiu? Apprentice. 【Shigu's Note】Guo and Fu are the same characters, and the original characters are the same.
